om.question
Class Rendering

java.lang.Object
  om.question.Rendering
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionRendering
public class Rendering
extends java.lang.Object

Information a Question provides in order that it may be rendered as XHTML for the user's browser.

setCSS

public void setCSS(java.lang.String sCSS)
Call to set CSS stylesheet.

In QActionRendering: This overrides any stylesheet that was previously set. You do not need to call this if you want to continue using the same stylesheet.

Parameters:
sCSS - CSS stylesheet contents

getCSS

public java.lang.String getCSS()
Returns:
CSS content or null if not set

addResource

public void addResource(Resource qr)
Adds a new resource.

In QActionRendering: The new resource is added to any existing ones, or replaces them if the name is identical. You do not need to re-add resources each time.

Parameters:
qr -

getResources

public Resource[] getResources()
Returns:
All resources added to question

setProgressInfo

public void setProgressInfo(java.lang.String sProgressInfo)
Parameters:
sProgressInfo - Brief information on progress through question that will be displayed alongside the question (for example, number of attempts remaining). Progress information is retained between actions if it is set to null in future ones.

getProgressInfo

public java.lang.String getProgressInfo()
Returns:
Progress information or null if no change
